name: Space Shooter (itch) (Splingo)
description:
Small space shooter project I created for an University project in C#.

Move either with WASD or Arrow Keys, Space to shoot.

Game has two methods of getting harder. According to your score, more enemies will spawn and they also get faster.

Background music: Catastrophic Success by Eggy Toast - https://freemusicarchive.org/music/eggy-toast/redaction/catastrophic-success/
